app_description: Accessibility audit tool for a more inclusive web in Paraguay and Latin America.
summary_excellent: Excellent work. Your site meets most accessibility guidelines.
summary_good: Good progress, but there are several critical points to fix to be inclusive.
summary_bad: Attention: Your site has significant barriers for people with disabilities.
issue_alt_text: Image without 'alt' attribute. Blind people cannot know what this image shows.
issue_alt_empty: Image with empty 'alt'. Make sure it's decorative or add a description.
issue_lang_missing: Language not declared. Screen readers won't know which language to read the content in.
issue_headings_none: No headings found. The site structure is difficult to navigate for keyboard and screen reader users.
issue_headings_broken: Broken heading hierarchy: skipped from H{last} to H{current}.
issue_form_label_missing: Form without label. A visually impaired user won't know what information to enter.
issue_link_generic: Link with generic text '{text}'. Screen reader users won't know where the link leads without context.
issue_tabindex_positive: Use of tabindex greater than 0. This alters the natural navigation order and confuses keyboard users.
